title: Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
OB: When a ServletRequestListener is defined and is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
EB: The expected behavior is that after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Define a ServletRequestListener. 
2. Call the AsyncContext.dispatch() method. 
3. Verify the returned DispatcherType from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
